Panzertron pulled a datatrack out of the ship's counsel and handed it 
to Zardus.

It read:

Terms of Alliance:

 Iron Fist and her resources/facilites are at the Alliance's disposal.
 The ship and her crew will defend anyone of the Alliance and 
participate in engagments when it can.
 The mutal aid agreement made previous with Megatron is still in 
effect until further notice with the Militrons there fore both 
parties will not enage in combat on the Iron Fist if both are present.

 The alliance is free to use Iron Fist as a back up base of 
operations in exchange for the above stated consents of the Militrons.

 -End-

Are these terms acceptable? Panzertron asked.
